崑.definition: used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]; (also used for transliteration)

崑山.definition: Kunshan, county-level city in Suzhou 蘇州|苏州[Su1zhou1], Jiangsu

崑山市.definition: Kunshan, county-level city in Suzhou 蘇州|苏州[Su1 zhou1], Jiangsu

崑曲.definition: Kunqu opera, influential musical theater originating in Kunshan, Jiangsu province in Yuan times
